attributes.action: Give temporary workers a pay rise when the perm staff get a pay rise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been in various temp jobs (unable to get a perm job and don't know why either). When the perm staff receive a pay rise, the temp staff do not. Temporary worker's bills are going up the same rate as perm staff. This is very unfair. Plus I have seen jobs in roles where I used to work have not changed their wage in the 2 years I have left the job. Have temporary job agencies heard of pay rises?
